trans-unit.source: Specifies the padding mode and parameters to use with RSA encryption or decryption operations.
trans-unit.target: 안쪽 여백 모드 및 RSA 암호화 또는 암호 해독 작업에 사용할 매개 변수를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> instance whose <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*> is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"></xref> with the given hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> 인스턴스입니다 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*>은 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"> </xref> 지정된 해시 알고리즘을 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 해시 알고리즘입니다.

trans-unit.source: An object whose mode is is with the hash algorithm specified by hashAlgorithm.
trans-unit.target: 해당 모드는 개체 은 로 지정 된 해시 알고리즘으로 hashAlgorithm .

trans-unit.source: The property of hashAlgorithm is either or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 속성 hashAlgorithm 있거나 또는 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current instance is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스가 지정된 된 개체와 같은지 여부를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: `obj` is equal to the current instance if it is a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> object and the two objects have identical <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: `obj`가 현재 인스턴스와 같으면는 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>개체 및 두 개체는 동일한 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A>및 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A>속성 값.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 obj 고, 그러지 않으면 현재 인스턴스와 같으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current instance is equal to the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스가 같은지 여부를 지정 된 결정 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: `instance` and the current instance are equal if they have identical <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: `instance`현재 인스턴스와 같으면 동일한 되며 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A>및 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A>속성 값.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: if other is equal to the current instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 other 고, 그러지 않으면 현재 인스턴스와 같으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code of this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 해시 코드를 반환 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The hash code of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스의 해시 코드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the padding mode represented by this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 나타내는 패딩 모드를 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: A padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 패딩 모드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash algorithm used in conjunction with the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"></xref> padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 와 함께에서 사용 되는 해시 알고리즘을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"> </xref> 패딩 모드입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*> property is not <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"></xref>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*>속성은 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode"> </xref>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 해시 알고리즘입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA1 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: SHA1 해시 알고리즘으로 표준 비대칭 암호화 OAEP (Optimal Padding) 암호화를 나타내는 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA1 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: SHA1 해시 알고리즘으로 OAEP 암호화 표준을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA256 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: SHA256 해시 알고리즘으로 표준 비대칭 암호화 OAEP (Optimal Padding) 암호화를 나타내는 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA256 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: SHA256 해시 알고리즘으로 OAEP 암호화 표준을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA-384 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Sha-384 해시 알고리즘으로 표준 비대칭 암호화 OAEP (Optimal Padding) 암호화를 나타내는 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA384 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: SHA384 해시 알고리즘으로 OAEP 암호화 표준을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA512 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: SHA512 해시 알고리즘으로 표준 비대칭 암호화 OAEP (Optimal Padding) 암호화를 나타내는 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA512 hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: SHA512 해시 알고리즘으로 OAEP 암호화 표준을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 두 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> 개체는 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> objects are equal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>개체가 서로 같은지 경우 해당 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A>및 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A>속성 값이 동일 합니다.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 첫 번째 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 두 번째 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> objects are unequal.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 두 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> 개체가 같지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> objects are not equal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>개체가 같지 않은지 경우 해당 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A>및 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A>속성 값이 같지 않은지.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 첫 번째 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 두 번째 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref uid="langword_csharp_left" name="left" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_right" name="right" href=""></xref> are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the PKCS #1 encryption standard.
trans-unit.target: 표준 PKCS #1 암호화를 나타내는 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the PKCS #1 encryption standard.
trans-unit.target: PKCS #1 암호화 표준을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 문자열 표현을 반환 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The string representation of a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> object is the concatenation of its <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and `OaepHashAlgorithm.Name` properties.
trans-unit.target: 문자열 표현을 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>개체는 연결 된 해당 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A>및 `OaepHashAlgorithm.Name` 속성.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 개체의 문자열 표현입니다.
